title: HomeWorld Cataclysm (v1.0.0.1 (US Patch Only))
description:
I wasted lots of time with this shit wont even
run on Win95SE:D,Win2000:D with(original game)
and without(cracked game) SP4 and Winxp with
and without SP2,SP3 with and without the patch
after this and that even some bang on the
computer:D twicks atlast this shit is working
flawless on Win7SP1-x64 even without installition
from the original cd.

Thought some might want this so here is the fix game

Note1: No need to install just run the "MakeShortcut.exe"
it will create a shortcut on your desktop, play the game from there

Note2: Original game EXE is included just in case

Note3: If someone needs the original cd then just drop a comment ill
be happy to share:)

Have Fun;)
